p: Briefly, the insect strain utilized in this study ( Sitophilus oryzae) was collected originally from a rice store bin in Beheira Governorate, Egypt. It has been reared at 28 °C on 95% corn seeds and 5% brewer′s yeast, 65% RH. Insects were sub-cultured from the laboratory colony, and specific life stages were removed. Mixed-sex adults were collected at 3–7 days post eclosion.
